text: quick question, when adding property parameters to a Contacts api call, is the convention to replace underscores with camelcase? E.g. would hs_lifecyclestage_marketingqualifiedlead_date become hsLifecyclestageMarketingqualifiedleadDate when added to the url as a property parameter i.e. &property=hsLifecyclestageMarketingqualifiedleadDate?
